name: filthy street urchin
desc: He looks squalid and thoroughly revolting.

name: scrawny cat
desc: A skinny little furball with sharp claws and a menacing look.

name: scruffy little dog
desc: A thin flea-ridden mutt, growling as you get close.

name: Farmer Maggot
desc: He's lost his dogs.  He's had his mushrooms stolen.  He's not a happy  hobbit!

name: blubbering idiot
desc: He tends to blubber a lot.

name: boil-covered wretch
desc: Ugly doesn't begin to describe him.

name: village idiot
desc: Drooling and comical, but then, what do you expect?

name: pitiful-looking beggar
desc: You just can't help feeling sorry for him.

name: mangy-looking leper
desc: You feel it isn't safe to touch him.

name: squint-eyed rogue
desc: A hardy, street-wise crook that knows an easy catch when it sees one.

name: singing, happy drunk
desc: He makes you glad to be sober.

name: aimless-looking merchant
desc: The typical ponce around town, with purse jingling, and looking for more  amulets of adornment to buy.

name: mean-looking mercenary
desc: No job is too low for him.

name: battle-scarred veteran
desc: He doesn't take to strangers kindly.

name: red-hatted elf
desc: It's Yuletide and this elf has had a few too many.

name: Father Christmas
desc: It's Saint Nick, out delivering presents to the town urchins.

name: grey mold
desc: A small strange grey growth.

name: grey mushroom patch
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.

name: giant yellow centipede
desc: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

name: giant white centipede
desc: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

name: white icky thing
desc: It is a smallish, slimy, icky creature.

name: clear icky thing
desc: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, blobby creature.

name: giant white mouse
desc: It is about three feet long with large teeth.

name: large white snake
desc: It is about eight feet long.

name: small kobold
desc: It is a squat and ugly humanoid figure with a canine face.

name: white worm mass
desc: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

name: floating eye
desc: A disembodied eye, floating a few feet above the ground.

name: rock lizard
desc: It is a small lizard with a hardened hide.

name: wild dog
desc: It is a yapping snarling dog, dangerous when in a pack.

name: soldier ant
desc: A large ant with powerful mandibles.

name: fruit bat
desc: A fast-moving pest.

name: kobold
desc: It is a small, dog-headed humanoid.

name: shrieker mushroom patch
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.  It doesn't sound so nice, though...

name: blubbering icky thing
desc: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, hungry creature.

name: metallic green centipede
desc: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

name: soldier
desc: An inexperienced but tough warrior.

name: cutpurse
desc: A rather shifty individual.

name: acolyte
desc: He is tripping over his priestly robes.

name: apprentice
desc: He is leaving behind a trail of dropped spell components.

name: yellow mushroom patch
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.

name: white jelly
desc: It's a large pile of white flesh.

name: giant green frog
desc: It is as big as a wolf.

name: giant black ant
desc: It is about three feet long.

name: salamander
desc: A small black and orange lizard.

name: white harpy
desc: A flying, screeching bird with a woman's face.

name: blue yeek
desc: A small humanoid figure.

name: Grip, Farmer Maggot's Dog
desc: A rather vicious dog belonging to Farmer Maggot.  It thinks you are  stealing mushrooms.

name: Fang, Farmer Maggot's Dog
desc: A rather vicious dog belonging to Farmer Maggot.  It thinks you are  stealing mushrooms.

name: green worm mass
desc: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

name: cave spider
desc: It is a black spider that moves in fits and starts.

name: wild cat
desc: A larger than normal feline, hissing loudly.  Its velvet paws conceal a  fistful of needles.

name: crow
desc: It is a hooded crow, gray except for the black wings and head.

name: Sméagol
desc: Usually known as Gollum.  He's been sneaking, and he wants his 'precious.'

name: green ooze
desc: It's green and it's oozing.

name: poltergeist
desc: It is a ghastly, ghostly form.

name: metallic blue centipede
desc: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

name: giant white louse
desc: It is six inches long.

name: black naga
desc: A large black serpent's body with a female torso.

name: spotted mushroom patch
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.

name: silver jelly
desc: It is a large pile of silver flesh that sucks all light from its  surroundings.

name: yellow jelly
desc: It's a large pile of yellow flesh.

name: scruffy looking hobbit
desc: A short little guy, in bedraggled clothes.  He appears to be looking for a  good tavern.

name: giant white ant
desc: It is about two feet long and has sharp pincers.

name: yellow mold
desc: It is a strange yellow growth on the dungeon floor.

name: metallic red centipede
desc: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

name: yellow worm mass
desc: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

name: clear worm mass
desc: It is a disgusting mass of poisonous worms.

name: radiation eye
desc: A disembodied eye, crackling with energy.

name: kobold shaman
desc: It is a kobold dressed in skins and gesturing wildly.

name: cave lizard
desc: It is an armoured lizard with a powerful bite.

name: scout
desc: An agile hunter, ready and relaxed.

name: gallant
desc: An adventurer both devoutly religious and skillful in combat.

name: tamer
desc: A lover of nature.

name: blue jelly
desc: It's a large pile of pulsing blue flesh.

name: creeping copper coins
desc: It appears to be a pile of copper coins.

name: giant white rat
desc: It is a very vicious rodent.

name: blue worm mass
desc: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

name: large grey snake
desc: It is about ten feet long.

name: kobold archer
desc: It is an ugly dog-headed humanoid wielding a bow.

name: silver mouse
desc: It is about three feet long with large teeth.  As the light of your lamp  falls on it, it seems to grow stronger.

name: Bullroarer the Hobbit
desc: He is a sturdy hobbit who is renowned for his unusual strength and vigour.   He can prove a troublesome opponent.

name: green naga
desc: A large green serpent with a female's torso.  Her green skin glistens with  acid.

name: blue ooze
desc: It's blue and it's oozing.

name: green glutton ghost
desc: It is a very ugly green ghost with a voracious appetite.

name: green jelly
desc: It is a large pile of pulsing green flesh.

name: large kobold
desc: It is a man-sized figure with the all too recognizable face of a kobold.

name: skeleton kobold
desc: It is a small animated kobold skeleton.

name: grey icky thing
desc: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, nasty creature.

name: disenchanter eye
desc: A disembodied eye, crackling with magic.

name: red worm mass
desc: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

name: copperhead snake
desc: It has a copper head and sharp venomous fangs.

name: giant white dragon fly
desc: It is a large fly that drips frost.

name: giant green dragon fly
desc: A vast, foul-smelling dragonfly.

name: rot jelly
desc: It is a large pile of rotting flesh, whose touch spoils your food.  The  terrible smell it exudes is also very hard to get rid of...

name: purple mushroom patch
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.

name: brown mold
desc: A strange brown growth on the dungeon floor.

name: giant brown bat
desc: It screeches as it attacks.

name: creeping silver coins
desc: It appears to be a pile of silver coins.

name: snaga
desc: He is one of the many weaker 'slave' orcs, often mistakenly known as a  goblin.

name: rattlesnake
desc: It is recognized by the hard-scaled end of its body that is often rattled  to frighten its prey.

name: giant black dragon fly
desc: The size of a large bird, this fly drips caustic acid.

name: giant gold dragon fly
desc: Large beating wings support this dazzling insect.  A loud buzzing noise  pervades the air.

name: crow of Durthang
desc: A crook-beaked bird with bedraggled black feathers.  It mocks you, and you  realise that its scorn can kill.

name: cave orc
desc: He is often found in huge numbers in deep caves.

name: wood spider
desc: It scuttles towards you.

name: bloodshot eye
desc: A disembodied eye, bloodshot and nasty.

name: red naga
desc: A large red snake with a woman's torso.

name: red jelly
desc: It is a large pulsating mound of red flesh.

name: giant red frog
desc: It looks poisonous.

name: green icky thing
desc: It is a smallish, slimy, icky, acidic creature.

name: zombified kobold
desc: It is an animated kobold corpse.  Flesh falls off in large chunks as it  shambles forward.

name: lost soul
desc: It is almost insubstantial.

name: eastern dwarf
desc: A dwarf of one of the eastern kindreds who has fallen under the sway of  Morgoth.

name: night lizard
desc: It is a black lizard with overlapping scales and a powerful jaw.

name: Mughash the Kobold Lord
desc: Strong and powerful, for a kobold.

name: Wormtongue, Agent of Saruman
desc: He's been spying for Saruman.  He is a snivelling wretch with no morals and  disgusting habits.

name: Lagduf, the Snaga
desc: A captain of a regiment of weaker orcs, Lagduf keeps his troop in order  with displays of excessive violence.

name: terrified yeek
desc: It is a strange small humanoid in a constant state of extreme terror.

name: giant salamander
desc: A large black and yellow lizard.  You'd better run away!

name: green mold
desc: It is a strange growth on the dungeon floor.

name: skeleton orc
desc: It is an animated orc skeleton.

name: lemure
desc: It is a minor but aggressive demon.

name: orc tracker
desc: A small orc with wide and snuffling nostrils.

name: ruffian
desc: An uncultured brute with a club, a sling and a whip.

name: giant black louse
desc: It makes you itch just to look at it.

name: yeti
desc: A large white figure covered in shaggy fur.

name: bloodshot icky thing
desc: It is a strange, slimy, icky creature.

name: giant grey rat
desc: It is a rodent of unusual size.

name: black harpy
desc: A woman's face on the body of a vicious black bird.

name: orc shaman
desc: An orc dressed in skins who gestures wildly.

name: baby blue dragon
desc: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light and its  scales a pale blue.

name: baby white dragon
desc: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light and its  scales a pale white.

name: baby green dragon
desc: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light and its  scales a sickly green.

name: baby black dragon
desc: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light and its  scales a dull black.

name: baby red dragon
desc: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light and its  scales a pale red.

name: giant red ant
desc: It is large and has venomous mandibles.

name: Brodda, the Easterling
desc: A nasty piece of work, Brodda picks on defenseless women and children.

name: king cobra
desc: It is a large snake with a hooded face.

name: baby gold dragon
desc: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light and its  scales a pale gold.

name: cave bear
desc: A large bear appears to have made its home in this cave.  It is hungry, and  you are trespassing in its territory.

name: giant spider
desc: It is a vast black spider whose bulbous body is bloated with poison.

name: blacklock mage
desc: A corrupted dwarf from the east, dressed in black mail, hurling spells  at you.

name: Orfax, Son of Boldor
desc: He's just like his daddy!  He knows mighty spells, but fortunately he is a  yeek.

name: stonefoot warrior
desc: A dwarf of the east in a coat of iron rings and wielding an axe.

name: clear mushroom patch
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.

name: Grishnákh, the Hill Orc
desc: He is a cunning and devious orc with a chaotic nature.

name: giant white tick
desc: It is moving slowly towards you.

name: hairy mold
desc: It is a strange hairy growth on the dungeon floor.

name: disenchanter mold
desc: It is a strange glowing growth on the dungeon floor.

name: pseudo-dragon
desc: A small relative of the dragon that inhabits dark caves.

name: tengu
desc: It is a fast-moving demon that blinks quickly in and out of existence; no  other demon matches its teleporting mastery.

name: creeping gold coins
desc: It appears to be a pile of gold coins, until it starts crawling towards  you on tiny legs.

name: wolf
desc: It howls and snaps at you.

name: giant fruit fly
desc: A fast-breeding, annoying pest.

name: panther
desc: A large black cat, stalking you with intent.  It thinks you're its next  meal.

name: witch
desc: She is dressed in black and smells of decay.

name: baby multi-hued dragon
desc: This hatchling dragon is still soft, its eyes unaccustomed to light and its  scales shimmering with hints of many different colours.

name: hippogriff
desc: A strange hybrid of eagle and horse.  It looks weird.

name: zombified orc
desc: It is a shambling orcish corpse leaving behind a trail of flesh.

name: drúadan mage
desc: A mage of short stature with stumpy legs and a wispy beard.

name: old forest tree
desc: An ancient tree that seems to be watching you.

name: black mamba
desc: It has glistening black skin, a sleek body and highly venomous fangs.

name: white wolf
desc: A large and muscled wolf from the northern wastes.  Its breath is cold and  icy and its fur coated in frost.

name: grape jelly
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.  It is a pulsing mound of glowing flesh.

name: nether worm mass
desc: It is a disgusting mass of dark worms, eating each other, the floor, the  air, you....

name: Golfimbul, the Hill Orc Chief
desc: A leader of a band of raiding orcs, he picks on hobbits.

name: master yeek
desc: A small humanoid that radiates some power.

name: priest
desc: A robed man, dedicated to his god.

name: ironfist priest
desc: A dwarf of the east, dressed all in black, chanting words of dark sorcery.

name: air spirit
desc: A whirlwind of sentient air.

name: skeleton human
desc: It is an animated human skeleton.

name: zombified human
desc: It is a shambling human corpse dropping chunks of flesh behind it.

name: tiger
desc: One of the largest of its species, a sleek orange and black shape creeps  towards you, ready to pounce.

name: moaning spirit
desc: A ghostly apparition that shrieks horribly.

name: warrior
desc: A warrior of considerable skill.

name: stegocentipede
desc: It is a vast armoured centipede with massive mandibles and a spiked tail.

name: spotted jelly
desc: A strange jelly thing, covered in discoloured blotches.

name: killer brown beetle
desc: It is a vicious insect with a tough carapace.

name: ochre jelly
desc: A fast moving highly acidic jelly thing, that is eating away the floor it  rests on.

name: Boldor, King of the Yeeks
desc: A great yeek, powerful in magic and sorcery, but a yeek all the same.

name: ogre
desc: A hideous, smallish giant that is often found near or with orcs.

name: creeping mithril coins
desc: It appears to be a pile of sentient mithril coins that doesn't like being  picked up.

name: illusionist
desc: A deceptive spell caster.

name: druid
desc: A priest devoted to Nature.

name: orc archer
desc: He has a bow of horn and a quiver full of black-feathered arrows.

name: giant flea
desc: It makes you itch just to look at it.

name: Ufthak of Cirith Ungol
desc: A strong orc guarding the pass of Cirith Ungol.  He is mortally afraid of  spiders.

name: blue icky thing
desc: It is a strange, slimy, icky creature, with rudimentary intelligence, but  evil cunning.  It hungers for food, and you look tasty.

name: flesh golem
desc: A shambling humanoid monster with long scars.

name: warg
desc: It is a large wolf with eyes full of cunning.

name: lurker
desc: A strange creature that merges with the dungeon floor, trapping its  victims by enveloping them within its perfectly disguised form.

name: wererat
desc: A large rat with glowing red eyes.  The wererat is a disgusting creature,  relishing in filth and disease.

name: black ogre
desc: A massive orc-like figure with black skin and powerful arms.

name: magic mushroom patch
desc: Yum!  It looks quite tasty.  It seems to glow with an unusual light.

name: guardian naga
desc: A giant snake-like figure with a woman's torso.

name: light hound
desc: A brilliant canine form whose light hurts your eyes, even at this distance.

name: dark hound
desc: A hole in the air in the shape of a huge hound.  No light falls upon its  form.

name: half-orc
desc: He is a hideous deformed cross-breed with man and orc, combining man's  strength and cunning with orcish evil.  The traitorous wizard Saruman is  generally believed to be responsible for this abomination.

name: giant tarantula
desc: A giant, fast-moving spider with hairy black and red legs.

name: giant clear centipede
desc: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

name: griffon
desc: It is half lion, half eagle.  It flies menacingly towards you.

name: homunculus
desc: It is a small demonic spirit full of malevolence.

name: clear hound
desc: A completely translucent hound.

name: clay golem
desc: It is a massive animated statue made out of hardened clay.

name: giant tan bat
desc: A giant bat, the beating of whose wings produces a strangely unnerving  noise.

name: umber hulk
desc: This bizarre creature has glaring eyes and large mandibles capable of  slicing through rock.

name: gelatinous cube
desc: It is a strange, vast gelatinous structure that assumes cubic proportions  as it lines all four walls of the corridors it patrols.  Through its  transparent jelly structure you can see treasures it has engulfed, and a  few corpses as well.

name: rogue
desc: He is eyeing your backpack.

name: Ulfast, Son of Ulfang
desc: A short and swarthy Easterling.

name: quasit
desc: A demon of small stature with an annoying bite.

name: uruk
desc: A cunning orc of power, as tall as a man, and stronger.  It fears little.

name: grizzly bear
desc: A huge, beastly bear, more savage than most of its kind.

name: craban
desc: A type of crow, specially bred by the forces of evil as spies; their  rudimentary intelligence guided by an evil mind has tracked you down, and  now they seek to alert other evil creatures to your presence.

name: imp
desc: A poisonous little mischief-maker.

name: forest troll
desc: He is green skinned, ugly and stupid.

name: Nár, the Dwarf
desc: The friend and companion of the dwarven king Thrór, he went mad with grief  after Thrór's death at the hands of Azog the Orc.  With torn beard and  ragged clothes, he seems to have fixed on you as a convenient target to  vent his anger.

name: 2-headed hydra
desc: A strange reptilian hybrid with two heads, guarding its hoard.

name: water spirit
desc: A whirlpool of sentient liquid.

name: giant red scorpion
desc: It is fast and poisonous.

name: earth spirit
desc: A whirling form of sentient rock.

name: hummerhorn
desc: A giant buzzing wasp, its stinger drips venom.

name: orc captain
desc: An armoured orc with an air of authority.

name: blackguard
desc: A hulking figure encased in deep black plate armour; he looks at you  menacingly.

name: fire spirit
desc: A whirlwind of sentient flame.

name: fire hound
desc: Flames lick at its feet and its tongue is a blade of fire.  You can feel a  furnace heat radiating from the creature.

name: cold hound
desc: A hound as tall as a man, this creature appears to be composed of angular  planes of ice.  Cold radiates from it and freezes your breath in the air.

name: energy hound
desc: Saint Elmo's Fire forms a ghostly halo around this hound, and sparks sting  your fingers as energy builds up in the air around you.

name: potion mimic
desc: A strange creature that disguises itself as a discarded potion bottle to  lure unsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

name: blink dog
desc: A strange magical member of the canine race, its form seems to shimmer and  fade in front of your very eyes.

name: shambling mound
desc: A pile of rotting vegetation that slides towards you with a disgusting  stench, waking all it nears.

name: evil eye
desc: A huge disembodied eye.  As you stare into the black nothingness of its  pupil, you feel your will and vitality draining away, and are unable to  do anything except approach it in horrified fascination.

name: Shagrat, the Orc Captain
desc: He is an orc of power and great cunning, leader of the garrison at Cirith  Ungol.

name: Gorbag, the Orc Captain
desc: He is an orc of power and great cunning, leader of the garrison at Minas  Morgul.

name: stone golem
desc: It is a massive animated statue.

name: red mold
desc: It is a strange red growth on the dungeon floor; it seems to burn with  flame.

name: Old Man Willow
desc: The ancient grey willow tree, ruler of the Old Forest.  He despises  trespassers in his territory.  "...a huge willow-tree, old and hoary.   Enormous it looked, its sprawling branches going up like racing arms  with many long-fingered hands, its knotted and twisted trunk gaping in  wide fissures that creaked faintly as the boughs moved."

name: blood falcon
desc: A blinding whirlwind of fear and feathers.  Its razor sharp beak and  talons fill its foes with terror as it seeks to rend flesh from bone  with unbridled ferocity.

name: Mirkwood spider
desc: A strong and powerful spider from Mirkwood forest.  Cunning and evil, it  seeks to taste your juicy insides.

name: Bolg, Son of Azog
desc: A large and powerful orc, he looks just like his father.  He is tall and  fast, but fortunately blessed with orcish brains.

name: 3-headed hydra
desc: A 2-headed hydra with an extra head, its mouth dripping venom.

name: earth hound
desc: A beautiful crystalline shape does not disguise the danger this hound  clearly presents.  Your flesh tingles as it approaches.

name: air hound
desc: Swirling vapours surround this beast as it floats towards you, seemingly  walking on air.  Noxious gases sting your throat.

name: sabre-tooth tiger
desc: A fierce and dangerous cat, its huge tusks and sharp claws would lacerate  even the strongest armour.

name: water hound
desc: Liquid footprints follow this hound as it pads around the dungeon.  An  acrid smell of acid rises from the dog's pelt.

name: chimaera
desc: It is a strange concoction of goat, lion and dragon, with the heads of all  three beasts.

name: quylthulg
desc: It is a strange pulsing mound of flesh.

name: sasquatch
desc: A tall shaggy, furry humanoid, it could call the yeti brother.

name: werewolf
desc: It is a huge wolf with eyes that glow with manly intelligence.

name: dark dwarven lord
desc: A leader of Morgoth's eastern dwarf recruits, dressed in black chainmail  and radiating evil power.

name: ranger
desc: A warrior who is at one with nature.  A master of both bow and sword, with  minor spellcasting skills, and animals come to do his bidding.

name: paladin
desc: A warrior for a holy cause.  Unfortunately, his god is not yours, and  there is rivalry even between the various gods of Good, so he is your  enemy.

name: Lugdush, the Uruk
desc: A large and powerful orc, captain of one of Saruman's orcish regiments.

name: blue dragon bat
desc: It is a glowing blue bat with a sharp tail.

name: scroll mimic
desc: A strange creature that disguises itself as a discarded scroll to lure  unsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

name: fire vortex
desc: A whirling maelstrom of fire.

name: water vortex
desc: A caustic spinning whirlpool of water.

name: cold vortex
desc: A twisting whirlpool of frost.

name: mummified orc
desc: It is an orcish figure covered in wrappings.

name: neekerbreeker
desc: Believed to be an evil relative of the cricket, this creature gets its name  from its incessant squeaking, which can best be described as "neek-breek,  neek-breek".  The noise can drive people frantic, and worse still, can be  heard for quite some distance, alerting other monsters to your presence.

name: Uglúk, the Uruk
desc: A strong and cunning orc warrior, the commander of Saruman's orcish horde.

name: killer stag beetle
desc: It is a giant beetle with vicious claws.

name: iron golem
desc: It is a massive metal statue that moves steadily towards you.

name: giant yellow scorpion
desc: It is a giant scorpion with a sharp stinger.

name: wyvern
desc: A fast-moving and deadly draconian animal.  Beware its poisonous sting!

name: phase spider
desc: A spider that never seems quite there.  Everywhere you look it is just  half-seen in the corner of one eye.

name: black ooze
desc: It is a strangely moving puddle.

name: Easterling champion
desc: A scarred warrior who wields an axe and moves with confidence.

name: Azog, Enemy of the Dwarves
desc: A great orc with a huge iron-clad head, agile and strong.  He is notorious  for starting the War of the Dwarves and Orcs by killing Durin's heir,  Thrór.

name: brigand
desc: A thief of great power and shifty speed.

name: red dragon bat
desc: It is a sharp-tailed bat, wreathed in fire.

name: giant silver ant
desc: A giant silver ant with a caustic bite and hard scales.

name: forest wight
desc: It is a ghostly apparition with a humanoid form.

name: Ibun, Son of Mîm
desc: One of the last of the Petty-Dwarves.  Ibun is a tricky sorcerous little  being, full of mischief.

name: Khîm, Son of Mîm
desc: One of the last of the Petty-Dwarves.  Khîm is a tricky sorcerous little  being, full of mischief.

name: 4-headed hydra
desc: A 3-headed hydra with an extra, smouldering, head.

name: mummified human
desc: It is a human form encased in mouldy wrappings.

name: vampire bat
desc: A blood-sucking bat that flies at your neck hungrily.

name: Sangahyando of Umbar
desc: A Black Númenórean with a blacker heart.

name: Angamaitë of Umbar
desc: A Black Númenórean who hates the men of the west.

name: banshee
desc: It is a ghostly woman's form that wails mournfully.

name: werebear
desc: In the eyes of this bear, there glimmers the faintest light of  intelligence.  And then its form begins to change...  The combination of  animal cunning, human intelligence and the great physical strength of the  bear makes for a dangerous enemy.

name: nruling
desc: Little sparks of flame that dance around you, lashing whips and cursing  horribly.

name: necromancer
desc: A gaunt figure, clothed in black robes.

name: hill giant
desc: A ten foot tall humanoid with powerful muscles.

name: pukelman
desc: A stumpy figure carved from stone, with glittering eyes, this sentinel  strides towards you with deadly intent.

name: stone troll
desc: He is a large, lumpish troll with scabrous black skin.

name: carrion crawler
desc: A hideous centipede covered in slime and with glowing tentacles around its  head.

name: killer red beetle
desc: It is a giant beetle with poisonous mandibles.

name: abyss worm mass
desc: A writhing wormlike shimmer of blackness, large as your arm.  It squirms  through air and walls with equal facility, leaving void in its wake.

name: giant firefly
desc: Clouds of these monsters light up the dungeon - so brightly that you can  barely see through them.

name: giant grey ant
desc: It is an ant encased in an impenetrable exoskeleton.

name: Ulwarth, Son of Ulfang
desc: A short and swarthy Easterling.

name: displacer beast
desc: It is a huge black panther, clubbed tentacles sprouting from its shoulders.

name: giant fire tick
desc: It is smoking and burning with great heat.

name: cave ogre
desc: A giant orc-like figure with an awesomely muscled frame.

name: disenchanter bat
desc: A giant bat which feeds on raw magical energy.

name: wolf chieftain
desc: A great wolf-chieftain whose pack is in the service of the Dark Lord, and  whose howls strike fear into even the boldest heart.

name: ghoul
desc: Flesh is falling off in chunks from this decaying abomination.

name: Mîm, Betrayer of Turin
desc: The last of his race, Mîm is a Petty-Dwarf.  Petty-Dwarves are strange  creatures, powerful in sorcery and originating in the East.  They have  been hunted nearly to extinction by the High Elves.

name: killer fire beetle
desc: It is a giant beetle wreathed in flames.

name: creeping adamantite coins
desc: It appears to be a pile of coins made of precious adamant, slithering  toward you on lots of tiny legs.

name: troll scavenger
desc: A powerful, man-eating troll, its claws foul with the traces of its last  kill.

name: vibration hound
desc: A blurry canine form which seems to be moving as fast as the eye can  follow.  You can feel the earth resonating beneath your feet.

name: nexus hound
desc: A locus of conflicting points coalesce to form the vague shape of a huge  hound.  Or is it just your imagination?

name: vampire
desc: It is a humanoid with an aura of power.  You notice a sharp set of front  teeth.

name: gorgimaera
desc: The result of evil experiments, this travesty of nature should never be  alive.  It has three heads - goat, dragon and gorgon - all attached to a  lion's body.

name: ogre shaman
desc: It is an ogre wrapped in furs and covered in grotesque body paints.

name: shimmering mold
desc: It is a strange growth on the dungeon floor, glowing and crackling with  sparks.

name: frost giant
desc: A twelve foot tall giant covered in furs.

name: spirit naga
desc: A wraithly snake-like form with the torso of a beautiful woman.

name: 5-headed hydra
desc: A 4-headed hydra with an extra head, steaming with acidic vapor.

name: black knight
desc: A hulking figure encased in deep black plate armour; he looks at you  menacingly.

name: Uldor the Accursed
desc: An evil and cunning man from the East.  Having once sworn allegiance to the  sons of Fëanor, it was Uldor's treachery that turned the tide of the  Battle of Unnumbered Tears in Morgoth's favour.

name: mage
desc: A mage of some power - you can tell by the size of his hat.

name: mind flayer
desc: A humanoid form with a gruesome head, tentacular mouth, and piercing eyes.   Claws reach out for you and you feel a presence invade your mind.

name: Draebor, the Imp
desc: An intensely irritating git of a monster.

name: basilisk
desc: A vile reptile that preys on unsuspecting travellers.  Its eyes stare  deeply at you and your soul starts to wilt!

name: snow troll
desc: He is a white troll with shaggy fur and powerfully clawed hands.

name: bat of Gorgoroth
desc: Fed with horrid meats and grown to enormous size, this slavering creature  seeks livelier prey.

name: spectator
desc: A lesser relative of the beholder: a globular body with a large toothy  mouth, a large central eye, and four smaller eyes on stalks protruding  from the top of its body.

name: Beorn, the Shape-Changer
desc: Beorn is only occasionally seen in human form these days, preferring to  appear in the shape of a giant black bear: he also prefers the company of  beasts to that of humans.  He has never taken kindly to strangers, even  in human form.

name: Beorn, the Mountain Bear
desc: Beorn in his form as a great black bear of the mountains, grown to  giant-size in wrath.  The roar of his voice is like drums, and no weapon  seems to bite upon him.

name: green elf archer
desc: An elf of the Land of the Seven Rivers, whose woodcraft was such that a  stranger might pass through their land from end to end and see none of  them.

name: giant black scorpion
desc: A gleaming black scorpion as large as a lion, with a pulsating stinger  and two great deadly claws.

name: purple worm
desc: It is a massive worm form, many feet in length.  Its vast maw drips acid  and poison.

name: catoblepas
desc: A strange ox-like form with a huge head but a thin, weak neck, it looks  like the creation of some deranged alchemist.

name: ring mimic
desc: A strange creature that disguises itself as a discarded ring to lure  unsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

name: young blue dragon
desc: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are a deep  blue in hue.  Sparks crackle along its length.

name: young white dragon
desc: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are a  frosty white in hue.  Icy blasts of cold air come from it as it breathes.

name: young green dragon
desc: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are a deep  green in hue.  Foul gas seeps through its scales.

name: energy vortex
desc: A shimmering tornado of air, sparks crackle along its length.

name: fire giant
desc: A glowing fourteen foot tall giant.  Flames drip from its red skin.

name: mithril golem
desc: It is a massive statue of purest mithril.  It looks expensive!

name: skeleton troll
desc: It is a troll skeleton animated by dark dweomers.

name: manticore
desc: It is a winged lion's body with a human torso and a tail covered in vicious  spikes.

name: giant blue ant
desc: It is a giant ant that crackles with energy.

name: giant army ant
desc: An armoured form moving with purpose.  Powerful on its own, flee when  hordes of them march.

name: grave wight
desc: It is a ghostly form with eyes that haunt you.

name: killer slicer beetle
desc: It is a beetle with deadly sharp cutting mandibles and a rock-hard  carapace.

name: ogre chieftain
desc: This ogre is leader of his tribe.  He sneers at you as he advances towards  you, wielding a huge club and pushing his own followers rudely aside.

name: ghast
desc: This vile abomination is a relative of ghouls, and often leads packs of  them.  It smells foul, and its bite carries a rotting disease.

name: Bert the Stone Troll
desc: Big, brawny, powerful and with a taste for hobbit.  He has friends called  Bill and Tom.

name: Bill the Stone Troll
desc: Big, brawny, powerful and with a taste for hobbit.  He has friends called  Bert and Tom.

name: Tom the Stone Troll
desc: Big, brawny, powerful and with a taste for hobbit.  He has friends called  Bert and Bill.

name: ghost
desc: You don't believe in it.  But it believes in you...

name: death watch beetle
desc: It is a giant beetle that produces a chilling sound.

name: young black dragon
desc: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are a  darkest black hue.  Acid drips from its body.

name: young gold dragon
desc: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are a  tarnished gold hue, and light is reflected from its form.

name: young red dragon
desc: It has a form that legends are made of.  Its still-tender scales are a  deepest red hue.  Heat radiates from its form.

name: huorn
desc: A tree which has become entish, or maybe an ent which has become tree-ish.

name: serpent of the brownlands
desc: A great serpent, with coils of steel, a lunge faster than the eye can see,  and fangs that drip with acidic poison.  Its eyes are mesmerizing.

name: ogre mage
desc: A hideous ogre wrapped in black sorcerous robes.

name: nexus quylthulg
desc: It is a very unstable, strange pulsing mound of flesh.

name: southron assassin
desc: A man of Harad clothed in black who moves with blinding speed.

name: memory moss
desc: A mass of green vegetation.  You don't remember seeing anything like it  before.

name: young multi-hued dragon
desc: It has a form that legends are made of.  Beautiful scales of shimmering and  magical colours cover it.

name: doombat
desc: It is a fast moving creature of chaos, a gigantic black bat surrounded by  flickering bright red flames.

name: drúadan druid
desc: A short, stocky man with an uncanny connection with nature.

name: stone giant
desc: It is eighteen feet tall and looking at you.

name: shadow drake
desc: It is a dragon-like form wrapped in shadow.  Glowing red eyes shine out in  the dark, and it is surrounded by an aura of unearthly cold that chills  the soul rather than the body.

name: cave troll
desc: He is a vicious monster, feared for his ferocity.

name: mystic
desc: An adept at unarmed combat, the mystic strikes with stunning power.  He can  summon help from nature and is able to focus his power to ease any pain.

name: barrow wight
desc: It is a ghostly nightmare of an entity.

name: skeleton etten
desc: It is the animated form of a massive two-headed troll.

name: chaos drake
desc: A dragon twisted by the forces of chaos.  It seems first ugly, then fair,  as its form shimmers and changes in front of your eyes.

name: law drake
desc: This dragon is clever and cunning.  It laughs at your puny efforts to  disturb it.

name: balance drake
desc: A mighty dragon, the balance drake seeks to maintain the Cosmic Balance,  and despises your feeble efforts to destroy evil.

name: ethereal drake
desc: A dragon of great power, with control over light and dark, the ethereal  drake's eyes glare with white hatred from the shadows.

name: fire elemental
desc: It is a towering inferno of flames.

name: water elemental
desc: It is a towering tempest of water.

name: crystal drake
desc: A dragon of strange crystalline form.  Light shines through it, dazzling  your eyes with spectra of colour.

name: troll priest
desc: A troll who is so bright he knows how to read.

name: Maia
desc: One of the first children of Eru, currently human-like in form, its body  shining with glorious light.  Whether this being has taken allegiance to  Morgoth or faces you in combat for some other reason is not clear; all  you know is that it stands before you, its eyes ablaze as it prepares its  next volley of spells.

name: troll blackguard
desc: A half-smart, vicious troll with some rudimentary magic and a love of  violence.

name: shade
desc: A shadowy form clutches at you from the darkness.  A powerful undead  creature with a deadly touch.

name: master thief
desc: Cool and confident, fast and lithe; protect your possessions quickly!

name: Ulfang the Black
desc: A short and swarthy Easterling dressed in black.  He and his three sons  once openly swore allegiance to the High Elves, but were secretly in the  pay of Morgoth.

name: lich
desc: It is a skeletal form dressed in robes.  It radiates vastly evil power.

name: earth elemental
desc: It is a towering form composed of rock with fists of awesome power.

name: air elemental
desc: It is a towering tornado of winds.

name: Eog golem
desc: It is a massive deep brown statue, striding towards you with an  all-too-familiar purpose.  Your magic surprisingly feels much less  powerful now.

name: wereworm
desc: A huge wormlike shape dripping acid, twisted by evil sorcery into a foul  monster that breeds on death.

name: Lokkak, the Ogre Chieftain
desc: An ogre renowned for acts of surpassing cruelty, Lokkak quickly became the  leader of a large band of violent ogres.

name: hill troll
desc: Clad only in close-fitting mesh of horny scales (unless that is his skin)  this troll strides toward you roaring like a beast, wielding a heavy  hammer in his knotted hand.

name: invisible stalker
desc: It is impossible to define its form but its violence is legendary.

name: gravity hound
desc: Unfettered by the usual constraints of gravity, these unnatural creatures  are walking on the walls and even the ceiling!  The earth suddenly feels  rather less solid as you see gravity warp all round the monsters.

name: inertia hound
desc: Bizarrely, this hound seems to be hardly moving at all, yet it approaches  you with deadly menace.  It makes you tired just to look at it.

name: impact hound
desc: A deep brown shape is visible before you, its canine form strikes you with  an almost physical force.  The dungeon floor buckles as if struck by a  powerful blow as it stalks towards you.

name: mûmak
desc: A massive elephantine form with eyes twisted by madness.

name: giant fire ant
desc: A giant ant covered in shaggy fur.  Its powerful jaws glow with heat.

name: chest mimic
desc: A strange creature that disguises itself as a chest to lure unsuspecting  adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.  The first that most  adventurers realise of the deception is when the seemingly invitingly open  lid of the chest suddenly grows teeth and then slams shut on the  adventurer's hand...

name: silent watcher
desc: A figure carved from stone, with three vulture faces whose eyes glow with a  malevolent light.

name: olog
desc: It is a massive intelligent troll with needle-sharp fangs.

name: colbran
desc: A man-shaped form of living lightning.  Sparks and shocks crackle all over  this madly capering figure, as it leaps and whirls around and about you.

name: cloud giant
desc: It is a twenty foot tall giant wreathed in clouds.

name: master vampire
desc: It is a humanoid form dressed in robes.  Power emanates from its chilling  frame.

name: ooze elemental
desc: It is a towering mass of filth, an eyesore of ooze.

name: smoke elemental
desc: It is a towering blackened form, crackling with heat.

name: xorn
desc: A huge creature of the element Earth.  Able to merge with its element, it  has four huge arms protruding from its enormous torso.

name: colossus
desc: An enormous construct resembling a titan made from stone.  It strides  purposefully towards you, swinging its slow fists with earth-shattering  power.

name: trapper
desc: A larger cousin of the lurker, this creature traps unsuspecting victims and  paralyzes them, to be slowly digested later.

name: bodak
desc: It is a humanoid form composed of flames and hatred.

name: dúnadan of Angmar
desc: A necromancer recruited to the evil realm of Angmar during the decline of  the North Kingdom.

name: Lorgan, Chief of the Easterlings
desc: A mighty warrior from the east, Lorgan hates everything that he cannot  control.

name: demonologist
desc: A figure twisted by evil standing in robes of deepest crimson.

name: gauth
desc: Another lesser relative of the beholder, this six-eyed creature feeds on  magic.

name: ice elemental
desc: It is a towering glacier of ice.

name: mummified troll
desc: It is a massive figure clothed in wrappings.  You are wary of its massive  fists.

name: spectre
desc: A phantasmal shrieking spirit.  Its wail drives the intense cold of pure  evil deep within your body.

name: magma elemental
desc: It is a towering glowing form of molten hate.

name: killer iridescent beetle
desc: It is a giant beetle, whose carapace shimmers with vibrant energies.

name: nexus vortex
desc: A maelstrom of potent magical energy.

name: plasma vortex
desc: A whirlpool of intense flame, charring the stones at your feet.

name: mountain troll
desc: A massive troll, larger and stronger than many men together.  It needs no  weapons aside from its massive hands and feet.

name: shardstorm
desc: A howling blast of razor-sharp mountain fragments, kept intact by perilous  magics.

name: emperor wight
desc: Your life force is torn from your body as this powerful unearthly being  approaches.

name: mummified chieftain
desc: A powerful ruler who refused the summons of Mandos on death, preferring  to re-occupy his now embalmed body.  He commands a legion of his former  subjects with unearthly shrieks.

name: will o' the wisp
desc: A strange ball of glowing light.  It disappears and reappears and seems to  draw you to it.  You seem somehow compelled to stand still and watch its  strange dancing motion.

name: death knight
desc: It is a humanoid figure dressed in armour of an ancient form.  From beneath  its helmet, eyes glow a baleful red and seem to pierce you like lances of  fire.

name: Castamir the Usurper
desc: A Black Númenórean who usurped the throne of Gondor, he is treacherous and  evil.

name: time vortex
desc: You haven't seen it yet.

name: shimmering vortex
desc: A strange pillar of shining light that hurts your eyes.  Its shape changes  constantly as it cuts through the air towards you.  It is like a beacon,  waking monsters from their slumber.

name: white wraith
desc: It is a tangible but ghostly form made of white fog.

name: etten
desc: A massive two-headed troll of huge strength, ettens are stupid but violent.   They are also living proof that two heads are not more intelligent than  one...

name: abyss spider
desc: A massive spider, heaving the bloated bag of its body between great  spined legs.

name: southron archer
desc: A man of Harad clad in black and red and carrying a longbow.  His quiver is  full of red feathered arrows, and carries an insignia of a black serpent.

name: mature white dragon
desc: A large dragon, scales gleaming bright white.

name: mature blue dragon
desc: A large dragon, scales tinted deep blue.

name: mature green dragon
desc: A large dragon, scales tinted deep green.

name: 6-headed hydra
desc: A 5-headed hydra which seems to have an extra head, if you could just see  it properly.

name: night mare
desc: A fearsome skeletal horse with glowing eyes, that watch you with little  more than a hatred of all that lives.

name: beholder
desc: A vile creature with one huge central eye, twelve smaller eyes on stalks,  and a huge mouth filled with sharp teeth.

name: disenchanter worm mass
desc: It is a strange mass of squirming worms.  Magical energy crackles around  its disgusting form.

name: spirit troll
desc: A weird ghostly troll-like being.

name: phantom
desc: An unholy creature of darkness, the aura emanating from this evil being  saps your very soul.

name: 7-headed hydra
desc: A 6-headed hydra with an extra head that waves mesmerisingly at you.

name: enchantress
desc: This elusive female spellcaster has a special affinity for dragons, whom  she rarely fights without.

name: sorcerer
desc: A human figure in robes, he moves with magically improved speed, and his  hands are ablur with spell casting.

name: xaren
desc: It is a tougher relative of the Xorn.  Its hide glitters with metal ores.

name: giant roc
desc: A vast legendary bird, its iron talons rake the most impenetrable of  surfaces and its screech echoes through the many winding dungeon  corridors.

name: minotaur
desc: It is a cross between a human and a bull.

name: vrock
desc: It is a demon with a long neck and raking claws.

name: death quasit
desc: It is a demon of small stature, but its armoured frame moves with lightning  speed and its powers make it a tornado of death and destruction.

name: patriarch
desc: A priest of great power, he is convinced of the righteousness of his  beliefs.  Stand in his way at your peril.

name: troll chieftain
desc: This troll's great strength and size have won it the place of chieftain of  its tribe.  It fears nothing.

name: mature red dragon
desc: A large dragon, scales tinted deep red.

name: mature gold dragon
desc: A large dragon with scales of gleaming gold.

name: mature black dragon
desc: A large dragon, with scales of deepest black.

name: stiffbeard sorcerer
desc: A dwarf with plaited beard and painted face, dressed in deepest black.   Power seems to crackle from his stocky frame.

name: master lich
desc: A skeletal form wrapped in robes.  Powerful magic crackles along its bony  fingers.

name: Gorlim, Betrayer of Barahir
desc: This sad creature - once a mighty warrior - betrayed his former friends to  Morgoth's army in return for, he thought, safety for himself and his  wife.  And so he fell under Morgoth's power and became little more than  a mindless servant of evil, even though the other side of his "bargain"  was not kept.

name: ranger chieftain
desc: A chieftain among the Rangers.  His understanding of nature gives him  powerful elemental spells to use against you, in addition to his skills  as an archer and a warrior.  Furthermore, he is a master of camouflage,  so you will need magically enhanced seeing to spot him.

name: Kavlax the Many-Headed
desc: A large dragon with a selection of heads, all shouting and arguing as they  look for prey, but each with its own deadly breath weapon.

name: hellhound
desc: It is a giant wolf that glows with heat.  Flames pour from its nostrils.

name: black-hearted huorn
desc: A huorn with a bad heart.

name: The Queen Ant
desc: She's upset because you hurt her children.

name: Rogrog the Black Troll
desc: A massive and cruel troll of great power, drool slides caustically down his  muscular frame.  Despite his bulk, he strikes with stunning speed.

name: Maia of Nienna
desc: A servant of Nienna, who grieves for the hurts to the world caused by  Morgoth.

name: Maia of Mandos
desc: A servant of Mandos, the summoner of the spirits of the slain.

name: mature multi-hued dragon
desc: A large dragon, scales shimmering many colours.

name: Vargo, Tyrant of Fire
desc: A towering fire elemental, Vargo burns everything beyond recognition.

name: Waldern, King of Water
desc: A towering water elemental, Waldern is master of all things liquid.  Wave  after wave drowns your frail body.

name: glabrezu
desc: It is demon with arms and pincers, its form a true mockery of life.

name: Quaker, Master of Earth
desc: A towering stone elemental stands before you.  The walls and ceiling are  reduced to rubble as Quaker advances.

name: Ariel, Queen of Air
desc: A towering air elemental, Ariel, the sorceress, avoids your blows with her  extreme speed.

name: multi-hued hound
desc: Shimmering in rainbow hues, this hound is beautiful and deadly.

name: 8-headed hydra
desc: A 7-headed hydra with an extra head which reeks of death.

name: dread
desc: It is a form that screams its presence against the eye.  Death incarnate,  its hideous black body seems to struggle against reality as the universe  itself struggles to banish it.

name: killer white beetle
desc: A giant beetle with a gleaming white carapace.  The air condenses around  its mandibles as it scuttles toward you.

name: rotting quylthulg
desc: It is a pulsing flesh mound that reeks of death and putrefaction.

name: nalfeshnee
desc: It is a large demon with the head of a giant boar.  Flames run up and down  its length.

name: undead beholder
desc: A beholder which has cheated death.  Black nether storms rage around the  bloodshot pupil of its central giant eye, and light seems to bend as it  sucks its power from the very air around it.  Your soul chills as it  drains your vitality for its evil enchantments.

name: demonic quylthulg
desc: A pile of pulsing flesh that reeks of sulfur.  The world itself seems to  cry out against it.

name: draconic quylthulg
desc: It looks like it was once a dragon corpse, now deeply infected with magical  bacteria that make it pulse in a foul and degrading way.

name: greater basilisk
desc: A large basilisk, whose shape resembles that of a great wyrm.

name: berserker
desc: Even the strongest of normal human warriors fears the Berserker - the one  who can drive himself into such a terrible battle-frenzy that he can  survive blows which should kill him, and still apparently feel no pain.   He tramples weaker creatures underfoot in his eagerness to get to his  real enemy, and his battle-cry strikes terror into his foes.

name: cyclops
desc: A gigantic ugly humanoid with but one eye and very thick skin.

name: grey wraith
desc: A tangible but ghostly form, made of grey fog.  The air around it feels  deathly cold.

name: lord of Carn Dûm
desc: An evil priest, dressed all in black.  Deadly spells hit you at an alarming  rate as his black spiked mace rains down blow after blow on your pitiful  frame.

name: vampire lord
desc: A foul wind chills your bones as this ghastly figure approaches.

name: marilith
desc: She is a demon of female form with many arms, each bearing deadly weapons.

name: death mold
desc: It is the epitome of all that is evil, in a mold.  Its lifeless form draws  power from sucking the souls of those that approach it, a nimbus of pure  evil surrounds it.  Luckily for you, it can't move.

name: ancient spider
desc: A foul creature of spider form, older even than the pits of Angband.

name: winged horror
desc: A terrifying sight: a winged creature greater than any bird you have ever  seen, and with no feathers on its horrid black leathery wings.  Descended  from a creature of an older world perhaps, bred by Sauron to be a winged  steed for his Ringwraiths.

name: gorgon
desc: This creature of legend has not just a serpent's body, but snakes for  hair.  Her scales rattle as she slithers towards you, eyes blazing,  venom dripping from her ghastly mouth.

name: storm giant
desc: It is a twenty-five foot tall giant wreathed in lightning.

name: lesser Balrog
desc: It is a massive humanoid demon wreathed in flames.

name: black wraith
desc: A figure that seems made of void, its strangely human shape is cloaked in  shadow.  It reaches out at you.

name: Eöl, the Dark Elf
desc: A lord of the Teleri, Eöl is a mighty metalsmith, the only one to ever  forge weapons of meteorite iron.  The mortal enemy of the Eldar, he is  currently fleeing their wrath, following the murder of Princess Aredhel of  Gondolin.

name: ancient blue dragon
desc: A huge draconic form.  Lightning crackles along its length.

name: ancient white dragon
desc: A huge draconic form.  Frost covers it from head to tail.

name: ancient green dragon
desc: A huge draconic form enveloped in clouds of poisonous vapour.

name: death drake
desc: It is a dragon-like form wrapped in darkness.  You cannot make out its true  form but you sense its evil.

name: great crystal drake
desc: A huge crystalline dragon.  Its claws could cut you to shreds and its teeth  are razor sharp.  Strange colours ripple through it as it moves in the  light.

name: ethereal dragon
desc: This terrible dragon is a master of light and dark.  Its form disappears  from sight as it cloaks itself in unearthly shadows.

name: master mystic
desc: A lord of all that is natural, skilled in the mystic ways.  He is a master  of martial arts and is at one with nature, able to summon help from the  wild if need be.

name: shadow
desc: A mighty spirit of darkness of vaguely humanoid form.  Razor-edged claws  reach out to end your life as it glides towards you, seeking to suck the  energy from your soul to feed its power.

name: The Balrog of Moria
desc: A huge Balrog surrounded by raging pillars of fire, this is indeed a  terrible opponent.  Wielding a great whip of fire and a blazing sword,  his fury blisters your skin and melts your flesh!

name: ancient black dragon
desc: A huge draconic form.  Pools of acid melt the floor around it.

name: ancient red dragon
desc: A huge draconic form.  Wisps of smoke steam from its nostrils and the  extreme heat surrounding it makes you gasp for breath.

name: ancient gold dragon
desc: A huge draconic form wreathed in a nimbus of light.  Its roar stuns and  deafens you.

name: nether hound
desc: You feel a soul-tearing chill upon viewing this beast, a ghostly form of  darkness in the shape of a large dog.

name: time hound
desc: You get a terrible sense of deja vu, or is it a premonition?  All at once  you see a little puppy and a toothless old dog.  Perhaps you should give  up and go to bed.

name: plasma hound
desc: The very air warps as pure elemental energy stalks towards you in the  shape of a giant hound.  Your hair stands on end and your palms itch as  you sense trouble.

name: Harowen the Black Hand
desc: He is a master of disguise, an expert of stealth, a genius at traps, and  moves with blinding speed.  Check your pockets!

name: Maia of Oromë
desc: A servant of Oromë, hunter of monsters and fell beasts.

name: hasty ent
desc: Ents are not altogether on anybody's side, because nobody is altogether on  their side.  This one seems quite roused, and does not seem to be on  your side.

name: Itangast the Fire Drake
desc: A mighty ancient dragon, Itangast's form scorches your flesh.  Wisps of  smoke curl up from his nostrils as he regards you with disdain.

name: hezrou
desc: A sluggish demon of lizard form, firing powerful missiles.  From the  terribly oversized jaws to the stumpy lashing tail, pools of burning  acid froth and sizzle.

name: ancient multi-hued dragon
desc: A huge draconic form.  Many colours ripple down its massive frame.  Few  live to see another.

name: chaos vortex
desc: Void, nothingness, spinning destructively.

name: Scatha the Worm
desc: An ancient and wise Dragon.  Scatha has grown clever over the long years.   His scales are covered with frost, and his breath sends a shower of ice  into the air.

name: The Phoenix
desc: A massive glowing eagle bathed in flames.  The searing heat chars your skin  and melts your armour.

name: drolem
desc: A constructed dragon, the drolem has massive strength.  Powerful spells  weaved during its creation make it a fearsome adversary.  Its eyes show  little intelligence, but it has been instructed to destroy all it meets.

name: demilich
desc: A lich who is partially immaterial, on its way to a new, ethereal form.

name: dreadmaster
desc: It is an unlife of power almost unequaled.  An affront to existence, its  very touch abuses and disrupts the flow of life, and its unearthly limbs,  of purest black, crush rock and flesh with ease.

name: nether wraith
desc: A form that hurts the eye, death permeates the air around it.  As it nears  you, a coldness saps your soul.

name: Shelob, Spider of Darkness
desc: Shelob is an enormous bloated spider, the last daughter of Ungoliant the  Unlight.  Her poison is legendary, as is her ego.  She normally guards the  pass through Cirith Ungol, but occasionally goes out foraging for food to  feed her voracious appetite.

name: dracolich
desc: The skeletal form of a once-great dragon, enchanted by magic most  perilous.  Its animated form strikes with speed and drains life from its  prey to satisfy its hunger.

name: dracolisk
desc: A mixture of dragon and basilisk, the dracolisk stares at you with deep  piercing eyes, its evil breath burning the ground where it stands.

name: Ar-Pharazôn the Golden
desc: Last and proudest king of ancient Númenor.  Corrupted by power and avarice,  he fell victim to Sauron's wiles, tried to fight the Valar themselves, and  condemned Númenor to oblivion.

name: barbazu
desc: A foul, humanoid creature with a long tail, clawed hands and feet, and a  disgusting, wiry, snaky beard.  They are the elite shock troops of the  hells, capable of a terrifying berserk fury.

name: lesser titan
desc: It is a humanoid figure thirty feet tall that gives off an aura of power  and hate.

name: grand master mystic
desc: He is one of the few true masters of the art, being extremely skillful in  all forms of unarmed combat and controlling the world's natural creatures  with disdainful ease.

name: hand druj
desc: A skeletal hand floating in the air, motionless except for its flexing  fingers.

name: 9-headed hydra
desc: A massive legendary hydra, like an 8-headed hydra, but with a massive  extra head that opens its mighty jaws at you.  Its many eyes  stare at you as clouds of vapour rise from its seething form.  And it  grows new heads as fast as you chop them off.

name: Baphomet the Minotaur Lord
desc: A fearsome bull-headed monster, Baphomet swings a mighty axe as he curses  all that defy him.

name: elder vampire
desc: A terrible robed undead figure, this creature has existed in its unlife for  many centuries by stealing the life of others.  It can summon the very  shades of its victims from beyond the grave to come enslaved to its aid.

name: Fundin Bluecloak
desc: He is one of the greatest dwarven priests to walk the earth.  Fundin has  earned a high position in the church, and his skill with both weapon and  spell only justify his position further.  His combination of both dwarven  strength and priestly wisdom are a true match for any adventurer.

name: Gilim, the Giant of Eruman
desc: Known as the giant of winter and the northern reaches,  he is tall even among giants, and his name is cursed in many lands.

name: Maia of Yavanna
desc: A servant of Yavanna Kementári, Queen of the Earth, the Giver of Fruits  and lover of all things that grow.

name: Maia of Aulë
desc: A servant of Aulë the Smith, lord of all the substances of Arda and friend  of the Noldor.

name: great earth elemental
desc: Appearing as a giant of stone, this mighty elemental seems to draw its  power from the very fabric of the dungeon.

name: aether vortex
desc: An awesome vortex of pure magic, power radiates from its frame.

name: Saruman of Many Colours
desc: Originally known as the White, Saruman fell prey to Sauron's wiles.  He  seeks to emulate him and breeds orcs and trolls to fight for him.  He  searches forever for the One Ring, to become a mighty Sorcerer-King of  the world.

name: nightwing
desc: Everywhere colours seem paler and the air chillier.  At the centre of the  cold stands a mighty figure.  Its wings envelop you in the chill of death  as the nightwing reaches out to draw you into oblivion.  Your muscles sag  and your mind loses all will to fight as you stand in awe of this mighty  being.

name: bile demon
desc: It's big.  It's fat.  It's red.  It's ugly.  It's got a severe attack of  highly poisonous flatulence.  And its insides are corrosive.  All of  which go together to make the single most repulsive sight - and smell -  you have ever experienced.

name: dreadlord
desc: It is a massive form of animated death, its colour deeper than black.  It  drinks in light, and space around it is twisted and torn by the weight of  its evil.  It is unlife and it knows nothing but the stealing of souls  and the stench of death.  Flee its hunger!

name: Smaug the Golden
desc: Smaug is one of the Urulóki that still survive, a fire-drake of immense  cunning and intelligence.  His speed through air is matched by few other  dragons and his dragonfire is what legends are made of; he is believed to  be the greatest dragon still surviving into the Third Age.

name: werewolf of Sauron
desc: A massive wolf, appearing like a mighty shadow.  Its glowing red eyes  glare malevolently as it defends its evil master's fortress.

name: spider of Gorgoroth
desc: One of the hideous brood of Ungoliant, spawned in the endless shadow of  Nan Dungortheb beneath the mountains of Ered Gorgoroth.

name: chaos hound
desc: A constantly changing canine form, this hound rushes towards you as if  expecting mayhem and chaos ahead.  It appears to have an almost kamikaze  relish for combat.  You suspect all may not be as it seems.

name: archlich
desc: A lich who has reached its ultimate evolutionary stage: a completely  immaterial state.

name: Maia of Ulmo
desc: A servant of Ulmo, Lord of Waters, who speaks to those who dwell in  Middle-earth with voices that are heard only as the music of water.

name: great water elemental
desc: A mighty column of water, terrible as a mounting wave that strides to the  land.

name: The Mouth of Sauron
desc: The Mouth of Sauron is a mighty spell caster.  So old that even he cannot  remember his own name, his power and evil are undeniable.  He believes  unshakably that he is unbeatable and laughs as he weaves his awesome  spells.

name: osyluth
desc: It is a demon made almost entirely out of bones.  It is humanoid, but with  a large tail similar to that of a giant scorpion, and emits a foul smell  of decay and rot.  They are despised even in the hells.

name: Fëanorian raider
desc: A veteran of the battles waged by Fëanor and his sons in pursuit of the  Silmarils, he attacks you with agility, power and cruelty.

name: eye druj
desc: A bloodshot eyeball floating in the air, you'd be forgiven for assuming it  harmless.

name: greater titan
desc: A forty foot tall humanoid that shakes the ground as it walks.  The power  radiating from its frame shakes your courage, its hatred inspired by your  defiance.

name: Tevildo, Prince of Cats
desc: Master of all things feline, Tevildo serves his master Morgoth well.   He delights in small torments and cunning stratagems, and laughs merrily  as he bats you about.

name: Thuringwethil, the Vampire Messenger
desc: Chief messenger between Sauron and Morgoth, she is surely the most deadly  of her vampire race.  At first she is charming to meet, but her wings and  eyes give away her true form.

name: beholder hive-mother
desc: A hive mother of the race of beholders, she can summon her brood to her aid  whenever she wishes.

name: jabberwock
desc: "Beware the Jabberwock, my son!  The jaws that bite, the claws that catch!"   Run and run quickly, for death incarnate chases behind you!

name: Tselakus, the Dreadlord
desc: This huge affront to existence twists and tears at the fabric of space.  A  master of mighty magic, Tselakus hungers for your tender flesh.  Darkness  itself recoils from the touch of Tselakus as he leaves a trail of death  and destruction.  Tselakus is a being of sneering contempt, laughing at  your pitiful efforts to defy him.  Mighty claws rend reality as he  annihilates all in his path to your soul!

name: bone golem
desc: A skeletal form, black as night, constructed from the bones of its previous  victims.

name: hound of Tindalos
desc: Bodies of death, receptacles of all foulness, they emerge like smoke from  the angles of time, ravenous and snarling and unsatisfied.

name: Nan, the Giant
desc: Known as the giant of summer and the south, he towers above you  like a great elm.  In his right hand, he holds the longest  sword you have ever beheld.

name: nightcrawler
desc: This intensely evil creature bears the form of a gargantuan black worm.   Its gaping maw is a void of blackness, acid drips from its steely hide.   It is like nothing you have ever seen before, and a terrible chill runs  down your spine as you face it.

name: gelugon
desc: This demon from the icy regions is a truly terrifying sight.  It has an  extremely large, insect-like body towering a full twelve feet tall, with  great claws on its hands and pincers on its mouth, and its head bulges  with great multi-faceted eyes.  Its tail is covered with razor-sharp  spikes.

name: great storm wyrm
desc: A vast dragon of power.  Storms and lightning crash around its titanic  form.  Deep blue scales reflect the flashes and highlight the creature's  great muscles.  It regards you with contempt.

name: great ice wyrm
desc: An immense dragon capable of awesome destruction.  You have never felt such  extreme cold, or witnessed such an icy stare.  Begone quickly or feel its  wrath!

name: great swamp wyrm
desc: A truly enormous dragon with great powers.  The foul gases issuing from the  beast nearly make you vomit; and while you may try to hold your breath as  you fight it, it sees no reason to do likewise.

name: Maia of Manwë
desc: A servant of Manwë Súlimo, the first of all Kings, lord of the realm of  Arda and ruler of all that dwell therein.

name: Maia of Varda
desc: A servant of Varda, Lady of the Stars, who the elves call Elbereth and  love above all the Valar.

name: greater demonic quylthulg
desc: A massive pulsating mound of flesh, strongly reeking of sulfur.

name: greater draconic quylthulg
desc: A massive mound of multi-hued scaled flesh, throbbing and pulsating.

name: greater rotting quylthulg
desc: A massive pile of rotting flesh.  A disgusting stench fills the air as it  throbs and writhes.

name: horned reaper
desc: A giant humanoid demon wielding a massive, heavy and sharp scythe.   Feared by foes and friends alike when it flies into one of its berserk  rages, the Horned Reaper will cut down anything in its path between it  and you - even the minions it has just summoned.

name: Ossë, Herald of Ulmo
desc: Encrusted with barnacles, slimy and dripping, the Maia of the untamed  sea has dragged himself down into Angband to send you to a watery grave.  Ossë is the most powerful and heartless of Ulmo's servants and embodies  the untamed power of the ocean.  Terror grows in your heart with each  squelching step of his approach.

name: great hell wyrm
desc: A vast dragon of immense power.  Fire leaps continuously from its huge  form.  The air around it scalds you.  Its slightest glance burns you, and  you truly realize how insignificant you are.

name: great bile wyrm
desc: A huge and very powerful dragon.  Great steaming pools of acid drip from  its form onto the ground.  You shudder when you see the acid eating away  the very stones of the dungeon - what could it do to you?

name: great wyrm of thunder
desc: A dragon of gigantic proportions, with destructive abilities to match.  The  sheer loudness of its roar leaves you stunned and unable to think clearly  enough to defend yourself adequately.

name: nightwalker
desc: A huge giant garbed in black, it breaks your armour from your back,  leaving you defenseless against its evil wrath.  It can smell your fear,  and you in turn smell the awful stench of death as this ghastly figure  strides towards you menacingly.

name: Omarax, the Eye Tyrant
desc: A beholder of great size and age, floating in the air.  His gaze seems to  shred your soul and his spells crush your will.  He is ancient, his  history steeped in forgotten evils, his atrocities numerous and sickening.

name: skull druj
desc: A glowing skull possessed by sorcerous power.  It need not move, but merely  blast you with mighty magic as it speaks the words of power.

name: black reaver
desc: A humanoid form, black as night, advancing steadily and unstoppably, even  the very rock of the dungeon cannot prevent it reaching you.

name: aether hound
desc: A shifting, swirling form.  It seems to be all colours and sizes and  shapes, though the dominant form is that of a huge dog.  You feel very  uncertain all of a sudden.

name: great wyrm of chaos
desc: A massive dragon of changing form.  As you watch, it appears first fair and  then foul.  Its body is twisted by chaotic forces as it strives to stay  real.  Its very existence distorts the universe around it.

name: great wyrm of law
desc: A massive dragon of powerful intellect.  It seeks to dominate the universe  and despises all other life.  It sees all who do not obey it as mere  insects to be crushed underfoot.

name: Ungoliant, the Unlight
desc: This enormous, hideous spirit of void is in the form of a spider of immense  proportions.  She is surrounded by a cloud of Unlight as she sucks in all  living light into her bloated body, and breathes out the blackest of  darkness.  She is always ravenously hungry and would even eat herself to  avoid starvation.

name: bronze golem
desc: A gigantic four-armed animated bronze statue of demonic shape, glowing with  great heat.

name: Glaurung, Father of the Dragons
desc: Glaurung is the father of all dragons, and was for a long time the most  powerful.  Though this is no longer so, he still has full command over his  brood and can command them to appear whenever he so wishes.  He is the  definition of dragonfire.

name: master quylthulg
desc: A giant seething mass of flesh, overwhelming you with monster after  monster.

name: Makar, the Warrior
desc: A battle-hungry spirit from amongst the Ainur, who built a grim hall in  the early days of Arda to host endless battles.  When not at home, he  and his sister Meássë hunt and seek out the turmoils caused by Morgoth.

name: Feagwath, the Undead Sorcerer
desc: A stench of corruption and decay surrounds this sorcerer, who has clearly  risen from the dead to continue his foul plots and schemes.

name: pit fiend
desc: Appearing as a giant, clawed and winged humanoid with a scaly red body and  massive fangs dripping a foul green liquid, the pit fiend is a dreadful  enemy from the lowest depths of the hells.  They are often the commanders  of vast demon armies.

name: Uvatha the Horseman
desc: A tall black cloaked Ringwraith, he is a master of horsemanship.  He longs  to taste your blood.

name: serpent of chaos
desc: Writhing coil upon coil, this mighty spawn of chaos constantly  disintegrates and reforms before your dazzled eyes.  It seeks to  obliterate you utterly; beware!

name: Adunaphel the Quiet
desc: A sorceress in life, Adunaphel quickly fell under Sauron's sway and the  power of the rings.

name: Qlzqqlzuup, the Emperor Quylthulg
desc: A gigantic seething mass of flesh, Qlzqqlzuup changes colours in front of  your eyes.  Pulsating first one colour then the next, it knows only it  must bring help to protect itself.

name: Akhorahil the Blind
desc: A mighty sorcerer King, Akhorahil was blind in life.  With powerful  enchantments, he created jewelled eyes that enabled him to see better than  any ordinary man ever could.

name: fury
desc: A female embodiment of rage, intent on tearing your mind and body apart.

name: great wyrm of annihilation
desc: A massive dragon of hideous form.  From its shadowy aura comes the stench  of the underworld.  Its body is twisted by chaotic forces as it strives  to stay real.  Its very existence distorts the universe around it.

name: sky dragon
desc: A wrathful dragon, of a breed that even legends do not mention,  rushing towards you like a thunderbolt.  Few ever face the wyrms  of the exotic airs; fewer live to tell the tale.

name: Wiruin, the Maelstrom
desc: A violent icy whirlpool, brought from the frozen wastes of the Helcaraxë  by Morgoth as guard and entertainment.  Smaller vortices arise on its  edges, and you feel as if you will never be free of its deafening roar.

name: Ren the Unclean
desc: Ren was an insane eastern king who believed himself to be the son of a  volcano god.  At an early age his sanity was destroyed by a plague that  wiped out his family, and he never recovered.

name: Maeglin, the Traitor of Gondolin
desc: The son of Eöl the Dark Elf, Maeglin is every bit as evil as his father and  more.  His greed for gold led him to betray the Hidden Kingdom of  Gondolin to Morgoth's forces.  He is a mighty warrior himself, and some of  Morgoth's greatest servants answer to his call.

name: Ji Indur Dawndeath
desc: This Ringwraith was a weak-minded sorcerer-king who fell easily under  Sauron's power.

name: great wyrm of balance
desc: A massive dragon, one of the mightiest of dragonkind.  It is thousands of  years old and seeks to maintain the Cosmic Balance.  It sees you as an  upstart troublemaker without the wisdom to control your actions.  It will  destroy you.

name: great wyrm of many colours
desc: A gigantic dragon whose scales shimmer in myriad hues.

name: Pazuzu, Lord of Air
desc: A winged humanoid demon, Pazuzu grins inhumanely at you as he decides  your fate.

name: Dwar, Dog Lord of Waw
desc: Dwar had a special affinity for dogs in life, and can still command them at  will.  He howls maniacally as he reaches out to destroy you.

name: Hoarmurath of Dir
desc: A Ringwraith powerful in fell sorcery, he yearns for the life he has lost  for an unlife of everlasting torment.

name: Draugluin, Sire of All Werewolves
desc: Draugluin provides Sauron with a fearsome personal guard.  He is an  enormous wolf inhabited with a human spirit.  He is chief of all his kind.

name: Khamûl, the Black Easterling
desc: A warrior-king of the East.  Khamûl is a powerful opponent, his skill in  combat awesome and his form twisted by evil cunning.

name: Cantoras, the Skeletal Lord
desc: A legion of evil undead druj animating the skeleton of a once mighty  sorcerer.  His power is devastating and his speed unmatched in the  underworld.  Flee his wrath!

name: greater Balrog
desc: Originally of the semi-divine Maiar, this evil spirit swore allegiance to  Morgoth at the beginning of time and is now one of his most terrible  demonic servants.  With its flaming whip and sword it seeks to destroy  you.

name: The Witch-King of Angmar
desc: The most fell of all Sauron's captains: King of Angmar, Sorcerer,  Ringwraith, Lord of the Nazgûl, a spear of terror in the hand of Sauron,  shadow of despair.  His spells are lethal and his combat blows crushingly  hard.  He moves at speed, and commands legions of evil to do his bidding.   It is said that he is fated never to die by the hand of mortal man.

name: Ancalagon the Black
desc: "Rushing Jaws" is his name, and death is his game; the greatest and most  terrible of all dragonkind, his power dismayed even the Valar for a time.

name: The Tarrasque
desc: The Tarrasque is a massive reptile of legend, rumoured to be unkillable and  immune to magic.  Fear its anger, for its devastation is unmatched!

name: Meássë, the Bloody
desc: Sister of Makar the Warrior, she would shout encouragement to the  warriors of their hall and heal their wounds so they could battle on,  until her arms were reddened to the elbow.  Meássë is delighted by  all violence, and recruits any beings of like abilities to her service.

name: Lungorthin, the Balrog of White Fire
desc: A massive form cloaked in flame.  Lungorthin stares balefully at you with  eyes that smoulder red.  The dungeon floor where he stands is scorched by  the heat of his body.

name: Huan, Wolfhound of the Valar
desc: The wolfhound of the Valar, Huan has served many masters in his time, from  Celegorm son of Fëanor to Beren son of Barahir: but now he runs wild and  acknowledges no master save himself, as he hunts alone for his nemesis -  Carcharoth, the terrible wolf of Angband.

name: Carcharoth, the Jaws of Thirst
desc: The first guard of Angband, Carcharoth, also known as 'The Red Maw', is the  greatest wolf to ever walk the earth.  He is highly intelligent and a  deadly opponent in combat.

name: Vecna, the Emperor Lich
desc: The greatest of all undead sorcerers, even the gods once feared him.  This  ancient shadow of death wilts every living thing it passes.

name: storm of Unmagic
desc: Howling through the disintegrating dungeon, this whirlpool of Unmagic rips  the enchantments from everything it touches.

name: Gothmog, the High Captain of Balrogs
desc: Gothmog is the Chief Balrog in Morgoth's personal guard.  He is renowned  for slaying Fëanor and Fingon, two of the High Kings of the Noldor,  and has never been defeated in combat.  With his whip of flame and  awesome fiery breath he saved his master from Ungoliant's rage.

name: Sauron, the Sorcerer
desc: Greatest and most terrible of the servants of Morgoth, creator of the One  Ring.  A sorcerer of dreadful powers, master of shadows and of phantoms,  foul in wisdom, cruel in strength, misshaping what he rules, lord of  werewolves; his dominion is torment.  He has many servants, and rarely  fights without them.

name: Wolf-Sauron
desc: Sauron's form as the mightiest wolf to walk the world.

name: Serpent-Sauron
desc: Sauron's form as a serpent: poisonous, biting, spitting, and threatening  to crush you in its mighty coils.

name: Vampire-Sauron
desc: Sauron's form as a vampire, great as a dark cloud across the moon.

name: Morgoth, Lord of Darkness
desc: He is the Master of the Pits of Angband.  His figure is like a black  mountain crowned with lightning.  He rages with everlasting anger, his  body scarred by Fingolfin's eight mighty wounds.  He can never rest from  his pain, but seeks forever to dominate all that is light and good in the  world.  He is the origin of man's fear of darkness and created many foul  creatures with his evil powers.  Orcs, Dragons, and Trolls are his most  foul corruptions, causing much pain and suffering in the world to please  him.  His disgusting visage, twisted with evil, is crowned with iron, the  two remaining Silmarils forever burning him.  Grond, the mighty Hammer of  the Underworld, cries defiance as he strides towards you to crush you to  a pulp!
